overview: Based on a short piece of writing about a true and actual event, this short film was created by Josiah Scheidel, adapted from his own work. The film features a teen-aged boy who, upon spotting an abandoned umbrella sitting in the street, wonders at whether to ignore it and continue on his way or take it home.
tagline: On my way home I saw an abandoned umbrella...
title: The Lone Umbrella
